text.par: All this work, all this training, for this?*br_
The room is almost empty: just a table, three chairs, three computer terminal and two men sitting in front of you. *br_
They look at you with no facial expression. *br_
Two computers are facing them, another one is facing you. *br_
The creepiest detail is the text on the computer monitor. This very text. *br_
The sentence about this sentence is now apprearing on the screen. It describes its own appearance on the screen. *br_
Your brain discovers a new kind of pain. "Logic pain" is how you decide to call it. *i_"How does the computer know?"*ei_ you ask yourself *i_"and why is it addressing me as "you"?"*ei_*br_
One man finally start to speak: *br_
*i_"Do you believe in Destiny?"*ei_ *br_
You open your mouth and then close it. *br_
The man continues: *i_"Do you believe that life follows certain paths, and that those paths are determined, somehow are written somewhere?*ei_ *br_
We do. *br_
Because we are those, who write the paths." *br_
His facial expression isn't changing at all, but you still have the impression that he is looking at you more intensively now.*br_
*i_"We are Destiny Writers, and maybe today you will become one of us."*ei_ *br_
How could you answer to that? You feel your body nod, but your brain doesn't know what to do with those words. *br_

*i_"We are lucky to be here today. Human survival is a very improbable fact. Sometimes things can go very wrong."*ei_ the guy continues. Then he opens a drawer and gets a gun out of it. It's an old revolver.*br_
*i_"We have been lucky for millenias, so lucky that we learned how to improve our own luck."*ei_*br_

He opens the gun, which is empty, and put a single bullet in the barrel. He then spins the barrel, like people in old movies did, before they played... how was it called? Oh, yes "russian roulette".*br_
He points the gun to the head of his colleague... and he pulls the trigger.*br_

and.par: *br_A lound noise, an explosion of blood, the body falls from the chair.*br_
With the same unchanged face expression the guy tells to a very shocked you: *i_"Your choice: save his life, or leave this office."*ei_ *br_His eyes are now looking at your computer.*br_
Your ears are still ringing and you are under shock, but you follow his eyes and look at the computer in front of you. *br_
The computer kept describing the scene, but you notice that the sentence "The gun shoots." is written in a brighter color then the rest. *br_
*i_"There's nothing I can do!"*ei_ you whisper. *br_
The man looks at you for few more seconds before simply saying: *i_"Then go."*ei_ *br_
You don't undestand.*br_ What is happening? What could you have done? *br_
But you worked for the Government for long enough before today, to recognize an order when you hear one. *br_
You nod, stand up, walk to the door and leave the room. *br_*br_ GAME OVER

text.and:
After few seconds you realize you are not breathing. You start breathing again, while the guy nods at you with something very close to a smile.*br_ *i_"The Writing Machine will tell you what you can change. Sometimes small details make a big diffence, as you just experienced in another possible Path of existence."*ei_*br_ You follow his eyes and look at the screen in front of you. *br_The computer kept describing the scene, but you notice that the sentence "The gun shoots." is written in a brighter color then the rest. *br_
*i_"The Writing Machine tells you what you can change, but can't decide what is meaningful."*ei_ continues the man, while putting a jar on the table. *i_"The decision, that is our job."*ei_ He puts the hand in the jar and picks a red ball yellow ball green ball out of it. *br_
He look at the ball: *i_"So, do you like it redyellowgreen ? You can change it to the color you like, it doesn't matter. It won't change anything else."*ei_*br_ He puts the redyellowgreen ball back in the jar.*br_ *i_"Don't worry, your first missions won't make the difference between life and death. You will start with easy tasks, like we all did. And before you ask: No, you can't try to kill old dictators. And also no, you can't create a paradox which will erease your own existence."*ei_*br_ Your mind is blank. Your eyes low back to the screen and stare at the sentence "Your mind is blank" for a moment before they go back to the man.*br_ *i_"You can go now"*ei_ he says, *i_"soon you will receive you first mission."*ei_*br_ You nod, stand up, and walk to the door.*br_*br_ Apparently you just became a *i_Destiny Writer*ei_.
